Body: Possible Duplicate:  Suggestions for syncing data to someone besides Google? Funambol?  Sync to my own server for contacts, sms and notes?  Has anyone been able to setup a home server as a replacement for Google Sync?I've found a handful of people touching on the right idea, Funambol is one but requires giving your data to another provider. I'd like, to be responsible for my own data.
Title: Has anyone been able to setup a home server as a replacement for Google Sync?

history.Text: Has anyone been able to setup a home server as a replacement for Google Sync?I've found a handful of people touching on the right idea, Funambol is one but requires giving your data to another provider. I'd like, to be responsible for my own data.
